title: [Large-Scale] Project-Based System Analysis and Design: Integrated Development of Chatbot and Dashboard

context.prior_knowledge: Basic computer literacy and database concept comprehension
context.additional_context: Learners consist of general citizens with intermediate domain expertise in science; aims to cultivate practical system design skills via project-based learning in a digital-device-provided environment

learning_goals: Learners can independently perform system analysis and design processes by applying Merrill's Pebble-in-the-Pond model.
Learners can develop applications reflecting multi-user requirements by integrating chatbots and dashboard components based on a common database.
Learners can present an integrated perspective in analytics and artificial intelligence through project deliverables.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
